description: Diceware passphrase generator written by Robin Edmunds (https://edmunds.me). Inspired by and built upon the work of: http://world.std.com/~reinhold/diceware.html https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2016/07/new-wordlists-random-passphrases
words: Number of words in each passphrase. (Default: 4)
separator: Character to use as separator between words. NOTE: Special characters may need to be enclosed in quotes. (Default: space)
raw: Raw passphrase output omitting phrase lengths. (Default: False)
